statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT order_id, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM sales_data WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT order_id, unit_price, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE order_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003);
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY total_price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_price ASC
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM sales_data WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_id
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(unit_price) AS avg_price FROM sales_data
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT DISTINCT order_id, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 3 AND total_price BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY order_date
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE date = '2022-10-05'
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 123
SELECT product_id, forecast_amount FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31'
SELECT date, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, forecast_amount FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY forecast_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(sales_amount) > 1000 ORDER BY avg_sales DESC;
SELECT s.date, s.product_id, s.sales_amount, f.forecast_amount FROM sales_data s INNER JOIN forecast_data f ON s.product_id = f.product_id WHERE s.date = '2022-04-15';
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE Quantity > 100
SELECT ProductName, Revenue FROM SalesData WHERE Date = '2022-07-20'
SELECT SeasonName, PatternDescription FROM SeasonalPatterns WHERE SeasonID = 3
SELECT ModelName, Algorithm, Accuracy FROM ForecastingModels WHERE Accuracy > 0.8
SELECT ID, ProductName, Quantity, Revenue FROM SalesData ORDER BY Quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE Quantity > 100 ORDER BY Revenue DESC
SELECT ProductName, SUM(Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM SalesData GROUP BY ProductName ORDER BY TotalQuantity DESC
SELECT Date, ProductName, Revenue FROM SalesData WHERE Revenue > 5000 AND Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY Date ASC
SELECT SeasonName, PatternDescription FROM SeasonalPatterns WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(PatternDescription) > 50
SELECT ModelName, Algorithm, Accuracy FROM ForecastingModels WHERE Accuracy >= 0.9 ORDER BY ModelName
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT season_id, season_name, start_date, end_date FROM Seasonality;
SELECT cycle_id, cycle_type, cycle_start_date, cycle_end_date FROM Cyclicality;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_sales FROM Forecasting;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM Seasonality WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData JOIN Forecasting ON SalesData.sale_id = Forecasting.forecast_id WHERE forecast_sales >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM Cyclicality WHERE cycle_start_date > '2022-03-01' AND cycle_end_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY cycle_start_date;
SELECT season_name, COUNT(*) FROM Seasonality GROUP BY season_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sales_id, product_id, sales_date FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_category DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT season_name, COUNT(sales_id) AS total_sales FROM SalesData JOIN Seasons ON SalesData.sales_id = Seasons.season_id GROUP BY season_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData JOIN Customers ON SalesData.product_id = Customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_sales > 5000;

SELECT product_name, product_category, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM Products JOIN SalesData ON Products.product_id = SalesData.product_id GROUP BY product_name, product_category ORDER BY total_sales DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, SUM(forecast_amount) AS total_forecast FROM Forecasts JOIN Customers ON Forecasts.sales_id = Customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, customer_email ORDER BY total_forecast DESC;
SELECT season_name, AVG(sales_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM Seasons JOIN SalesData ON Seasons.season_id = SalesData.sales_id GROUP BY season_name ORDER BY avg_quantity ASC;
